spells.name: Breathe Without Air
spells.description: Allows the target to survive without air (underwater or vacuum) for the duration; normal activity possible.

spells.name: Energy Bolt
spells.description: Fires a concentrated bolt of magical energy at a target, dealing energy damage depending on caster power.

spells.name: Fingers of Wind
spells.description: Creates razor gusts or slicing wind from the caster's fingertips, able to cut or shove opponents and small objects.

spells.name: Fool's Gold
spells.description: Transmutes or disguises ordinary materials into convincing but worthless gold; often used to deceive.

spells.name: Impervious to Fire
spells.description: Grants resistance or immunity to fire damage for the duration.

spells.name: Impervious to Poison
spells.description: Grants strong resistance to common poisons and toxins for a short duration.

spells.name: Invisibility: Simple
spells.description: Makes the subject effectively invisible to normal perception; limited by magical/technological detection.

spells.name: Multiple Image
spells.description: Creates illusory duplicates of the caster to confuse attackers, granting defensive bonuses.

spells.name: Paralysis: Lesser
spells.description: Partial paralysis that reduces mobility and actions for affected targets unless they save.

spells.name: Telekinesis
spells.description: Manipulate, lift, and hurl objects or apply force to creatures at range; effectiveness scales with caster power.
